long_description: The SmartWool No Show Socks have a lightweight, non-cushioned design that you'll barely notice when you're wearing casual footwear. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon, these socks wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and comfortable. Spandex stretch delivers all-day comfort. Silicone grippers at the heels help keep the socks in place. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The SmartWool No Show Socks have a lightweight, non-cushioned design that you'll barely notice when you're wearing casual footwear.
